info.title: RightScale Optima API
info.description:
Rightscale Optima allows you to manage and optimize cloud costs. The API exposes the BillConnect resource.

The API is available at the following endpoint:
* https://customer-onboarding-front.rightscale.com

## BillConnect

The BillConnect resource represents credentials and information that Optima uses to analyze cloud costs.

## Auth
Requests made to the API must be authenticated using a token obtained from the [Cloud Management API](http://docs.rightscale.com/api/general_usage.html#authentication).
An "Api-Version" header must also be set; the current version is "1.0".
The API actions below list privileges (aka security scopes) required to access that particular action. Privileges are granted by
roles in the [user governance application](http://docs.rightscale.com/cm/ref/user_roles.html).

For more detailed information on roles, see [policy access control](http://docs.rightscale.com/policies/#access-control).

get.description:
Index displays all bill connects across all cloud vendors.

Required security scopes:
  * `optima:bill_connect:index`

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: Identifies an organization by ID.

parameters.name: Api-Version
parameters.description: API Version, must be specified using this header

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

post.summary: Creates an AWS bill connect using the legacy IAM User-based authorization method
post.description:
Create constructs an AWS bill connect using the legacy IAM User-based authorization method.

Required security scopes:
  * `optima:bill_connect:create`

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: Identifies an organization by ID.

parameters.name: Api-Version
parameters.description: API Version, must be specified using this header

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

patch.summary: Updates an AWS bill connect that was created using the legacy AWS IAM User-based create method
patch.description:
Update amends an AWS bill connect that was created using the legacy AWS IAM User-based create method.

Required security scopes:
  * `optima:bill_connect:update`

aws_bucket_name.description: Name of the S3 bucket where bill files are saved

aws_bucket_path.description: Path to the bile files from the AWS S3 bucket root

aws_bucket_region.description: Region that the bucket is in
aws_bucket_region.example: Rerum consequuntur eaque quos fuga et.

aws_sts_external_id.description: Unique identifier that might be required when assuming a role in another account

aws_sts_policy_json.description: Restrictive IAM policy in JSON format for role-based tokens

aws_sts_role_arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to assume

aws_sts_role_session_name.description: Identifier for the assumed role session

azure_enrollment_number.description: Enrollment number of azure in the enterprise agreement

cloud_vendor_id.description: ID of the cloud vendor the bill connect belongs to

created_at.description: created_at is the time when the bill connect was created.

google_bigquery_dataset.description: Name of the BigQuery dataset where bill data is deposited

google_project_id.description: Project ID for Google billing access

GoogleCredentialsRequestBody.title: GoogleCredentialsRequestBody

client_email.description: Client email address for Google billing access

project_id.description: Project ID for Google billing access

GoogleCredentialsRequestBody.description: The set of fields from downloaded Google credentials JSON used for accessing billing data.

GlobalSession.description:
**Security Scopes**:
  * `optima:bill_connect:create`: Allow bills to be connected by adding billing credentials
  * `optima:bill_connect:delete`: Allow deletion of connected bills
  * `optima:bill_connect:index`: Allow view of all connected bills
  * `optima:bill_connect:show`: Allow view of individual connected bills
  * `optima:bill_connect:update`: Allow already connected bills to be modified
GlobalSession.name: Authorization
